forwardToParachain(uint256).details: Sends USDC to the parachain's sovereign account on AssetHub

params._amount: Amount of USDC to allocate for coretime

tip(uint256,uint256,string).details: Uses AssetHub USDC (Asset ID 1337), deducts 0.1% for coretime costs

withdrawProtocolFees(uint256).details: Only owner can withdraw to treasury for coretime purchases
